pieces

Interface Move

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Piece, Queen, Rook

    public interface Move

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void calculateMoves()
      calculates the moves that a piece can make calculates every move possible, by the rules, without considering the board state
      void neverMoved()
      method to be called when a new piece is put into the board
